messages.content:
Hi, {name}! 🔥
I’ve got an exclusive invite for you to our event {eventName}, where we’ll reveal the opportunity of the decade! 📈💰
So far, 1-7% monthly returns and over 1000% asset appreciation – and this is just the beginning!

📍 Location: {eventLocation}
🕕 Start: {eventDate}

We’re excited to see you there! 💡🔥

‼️The big day is tomorrow! 🔥

📅 {eventName} kicks off tomorrow! Get ready for an event that could change the way you think about investing and building wealth. 💰🚀

🔹 Gain access to insights known only by the most successful.
🔹 Learn how to achieve stable passive income with minimal risk.
🔹 Meet people who have already walked this path and are now living their dream.

🎟️ Your name is already on the list, so just bring your good vibes and lots of energy to take it all in!

📍 Location: {eventLocation}
🕕 Start: {eventDate}

Be ready! 💡🔥

📢 It all starts today! ⏳

🔹 {eventName} kicks off today, and you can’t miss it! Expect exclusive insights that could change your approach to investing and business. 📈💰

🌟 What’s in store?
🔹 Access to information only known by the top players.
🔹 Learn how to generate stable passive income with minimal risk.
🔹 Meet people who’ve been there and now live their dream.

🎯 Don’t miss this opportunity! 📅

📍 Location: {eventLocation}
🕕 Start: {eventDate}

🔥 Are you ready? We’ll be sending you updates and news right here! 🚀

⏳ We start in one hour! 🔥

Are you ready to step into a world of new opportunities? 💡 {eventName} begins in just an hour, so now’s the perfect time to get set!

📌 What should you have ready?
✅ Internet connection for smooth access to the presentations.
✅ Questions you’d like answered.
✅ An open mind – because what you’ll learn might change your life!

📍 Location: {eventLocation}
🕕 Start: {eventDate}

🎟️ Join on time and get ready for something big! 🚀
So, did you manage to stake? 🏆 You’re already on the right path! Keep going and don’t miss the next steps toward maximum returns. 💰🚀

‼️ Still have questions? Here's your chance! 🔥

📅 Next opportunity call:
{opportunityCallDate}

🌟 What you’ll learn:
✅ How it all works
✅ How to achieve high returns with minimal risk
✅ LIVE Q&A – ask anything!
🎟️ Registration is FREE, but spots are limited! Join now before it fills up!

Link: {opportunityCall}

⏳ Today at 6:00 PM, the webinar starts – and it could change your life! 🚀

❌ Don’t miss your chance – tonight you’ll learn how to make the most of this opportunity! 💰💎
📌 Join on time so you don’t miss a thing!

Link: {opportunityCall}

🚀 WE’RE STARTING SOON!
📢 Last chance to join the webinar!
🔴 Click and watch LIVE! 🎥👇

Link: {opportunityCall}

Are you ready to take the first step? 🌟 Here’s your unique Academy Link with a detailed plan to get started:

✅ Create and connect your wallet
💳 Buy POLs
🎟️ Get your ticket to the world of Betfin
🔄 Exchange POLs for BETs
💎 Stake your BET tokens and start earning profits!

👉 Your Academy Link:
{academyLink}

💬 Got questions? Join our Discord community and ask the experienced members! 🚀

Discord Community
